content.text:
# 1964 Waratah state by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly seat of Waratah on 19 September 1964. It was triggered by the death of Edward Greaves ().
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 4 July 1964
| Death of Edward Greaves.
|-
| 15 July 1964
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 20 July 1964
| Date of nomination
|-
| 8 August 1964
| Polling day
|-
| 9 September 1964
| Return of writ
|}
Result
}}
Edward Greaves () died.

*Electoral results for the district of Waratah
*List of New South Wales state by-elections
